mean_cn: adj. ［生］生理节奏的，以24小时为周期的
mean_en: relating to the regular changes in a person or thing that happen in 24-hour periods
word_etyma: circ环+ ad + ian名词后缀 → 环形的状态就是规律 → circadian 生理节奏的
short_phrase: Our circadian rhythm tells us when to wake up or sleep.
sentence: Our "circadian rhythm" determines when we want to sleep and wake up.
sentence_trans: 我们的“生理周期”决定了我们什么时候睡觉，以及什么时候起床。
